item.title: Walmart Misses on Second-Quarter Profit
item.description: Walmart Inc. missed profit expectations for the first time in three years in the second quarter, but raised its full-year sales guidance. David Bellinger, senior consumer analyst at Mizuho examines th

item.title: Wal-Mart de Mexico CEO Ignacio Caride Resigns Abruptly
item.description: Wal-Mart de Mexico SAB, the local unit of the US retailer, said Chief Executive Officer Ignacio Caride presented his resignation and is leaving the company’s top job, effective today.

item.title: Walmex Shares See Biggest Drop Since 2018 After Earnings
item.description: Walmart de Mexico SAB de CV shares plunged Thursday — their worst drop since November 2018 — after posting quarterly profit that missed estimates.
